Data System Services LLC.

Android Developer
2016 - Current

I started with the company as a Level 1 help desk technician and worked my way into Development. Now I am the sole developer writing an Android application using the React Native Javascript framework. I also wrote a RESTful API allowing the application to communicate with the MSSQL database using NodeJS with Express.
